title: Epidemic Simulation for a City
description: Simulation of an epidemic outbreak in a city with a population of 1000 people.

interactions.name: person_to_person_interaction
interactions.description: People interact with each other which can lead to the spread of the epidemic.

interactions.name: person_to_location_interaction
interactions.description: People move to different locations which can affect the infection rate of the location.

metrics.name: total_infected
metrics.description: Total number of people infected in the simulation at any given time.

metrics.name: total_recovered
metrics.description: Total number of people who have recovered from the infection.

metrics.name: total_deaths
metrics.description: Total number of deaths due to the epidemic.

validation_criteria.name: infection_rate
validation_criteria.description: The infection rate in the simulation should align with real-world data on similar epidemics.

validation_criteria.name: recovery_rate
validation_criteria.description: The recovery rate in the simulation should align with real-world data on similar epidemics.

validation_criteria.name: death_rate
validation_criteria.description: The death rate in the simulation should align with real-world data on similar epidemics.
